name: Korea University
description: Korea University, founded in 1905, carries on the spirit of "saving the nation through education." It has established itself as one of the most prestigious higher education institution in Korea, and it embraces the challenges of the 21st Century by building new bridges across old boundaries. Under the "Global KU" initiative, Korea University strives to bring together the students, faculty and programs of other leading universities around the world with that of KU.
